Pet Manager Joey:
The most important thing to remember when raising a pet is love. For a loving master, a pet will carry immense burdens, fight ferociously and prove their loyalty a thousand times over...
Listen to instructions about how to raise a pet.
Purchase pet items.
Exchange pet equipment for higher-grade one.
Exchange the Hatchling's equipment with the equipment for strider.
Evolve pet.
Exchange the pet trade ticket with a pet.
Sell an items.
See the Lord and get the tax rate information.
